content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: nether_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 10, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 28}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 50, "index": 30}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 43, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a nether_brick_stairs, I need to place 6 nether_bricks in a stair pattern in the crafting table. I will start by moving one of the nether_bricks from slot 28 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I will now move another nether_brick to slot 4, which is one slot below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 9}, {"type": "nautilus_shell", "quantity": 10, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 16, "index": 16}, {"type": "stone_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "purple_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 21, "index": 29}, {"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 50, "index": 30}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 43, "index": 36}]
thought: Now that I have arranged the nether_bricks in the correct pattern, I can craft the nether_brick_stairs by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4
